author: iarspider-cmssw
body: This PR was made to check the build of (py-)torch. We should only merge it if CMS-ML group really want to make use of this external otherwise it will increase the maintenance for external software stack ( as it has a large dependency chain https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/8388/files#diff-1718ab1f6737a0d8faffa3b2914ec2f72b87d478b4e3db04828411d2878479a1R11 )
title: Add test for (py3-)torch
